item.title: How to Automate Invoice Chasing for Your Small Business in Australia
item.description: Let’s be real for a second. You didn’t start a business to spend your evenings sending awkward “just following up on that invoice” emails. Nobody did. Yet here we are â€” the Australian Small Business and Family Enterprise Ombudsman reports that late payments cost Australian small businesses over $115 billion in outstanding invoices at any given time. The average payment time for small business invoices in Australia sits around 30-35 days beyond the due date.
